author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Do not believe all that you hear and see.Always check the original source of information.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: The greatest triumph is victory over all trials.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Keep the enthusiasm of your youth and treasure the wisdom of old age.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: My best form of investment is paying my tithe and offering.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Bitterness is the cancer of bones.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: It is vanity to chase the whirlwind.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Why do you chase the wind?
author: Lailah Gifty Akita
